elements.name: Verify the current cashier name is not override with store mode login

steps.name: The user is on MRV sco page
User clicks on store sign in button
Verify if user is navigated to the store sign in page
Enter the Login Credentials
Verify if user is navigated to start scanning page
The User is on Start scanning with Menu page
Click on the Store Mode Button in Bottom Left
Enter the Store Login Credentials
Validate the StoreMode Page
The user clicks on the Cashier Tools menu
Validate the Cashier Tools Page
Validate the current cashier name is not change "T U. (Current)"
Click on exit store mode button in the store mode page
The User is on Start scanning with Menu page
The user clicks on the Item Entry menu
Validate the Item Entry Page
Click the Valid Item number in touchpad keyboard and Enter
Validate the add quantity page with user Message "How many do you have?"
Click the quantity for the Item and Enter
Validate the item added in the cart
Click on the Pay Now button
Validate the Bag page
Enter the Bag quantity using touchpad and Click Enter
Validate the Tender Page
Insert the card in the PED device and enter the Pin number
Authorization Loader get enabled
Provide the signature from PinPad
Validate the Select the Print option page
Click on the Print button
Validate the AddAssociateToWorkFile API call "S6415TU1"
Validate the Thanks for shopping page

elements.name: Verify the intervention login should not override the current cashier

steps.name: The user is on MRV sco page
User clicks on store sign in button
Verify if user is navigated to the store sign in page
Enter the Login Credentials
Verify if user is navigated to start scanning page
The User is on Start scanning with Menu page
The user clicks on the Item Entry menu
Validate the Item Entry Page
Click the Hard stop Item number in touchpad keyboard and Enter
The user will be redirected to Help is on the way page
Required Store SignIn to verify the Hard Stop Item, So Click on the Store SignIn button
Verify if user is navigated to the store sign in page
Enter the Intervention Login Credentials
Verify if the user navigated to the Item cannot be sold Page
Click Return To Cart button displayed on the screen
Click the Back button from the Item Entry page
Click on the Store Mode Button in Bottom Left
Enter the Login Credentials
Validate the StoreMode Page
The user clicks on the Cashier Tools menu
Validate the Cashier Tools Page
Validate the current cashier name is not change "T U. (Current)"
